findings.title: Frontrunning / Race Condition Possibilities
findings.description: If a token owner first approves a spender a certain amount and intends to change it later in the future, say to a lesser value. A spender who is aware of this can frontrun the token owner and spend up to the first approval before the changes of approval price is effected.

findings.title: Unlocked pragma
findings.description: Using an unlocked solidity pragma version can lead to bugs and potential security vulnerabilities due to prospective versions.

findings.title: Frontrunning/Race Condition Possibilities
findings.description: There are possibilities of front running and race conditions if a token owner first approves a spender a certain amount and intends to change it later. A spender who is aware of this can frontrun the token owner and spend up to the first approval before the changes of approval price is effected.
